articles.title: Elon Musk Stays Glued To Trump's Side At Mar-A-Lago Thanksgiving - HuffPost

articles.content:
Elon Musk continued to saddle up to Donald Trump over the holidays as he was seen at the president-elects side during Thanksgiving celebration at Mar-a-Lago.
